translations: n.<正式>行为；<英>契约；功绩（deed 的复数）
v.立契转让（deed 的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: His deeds went down in the annals of British history.
sentences.translation: 他的事迹已载入英国史册。

sentences.sentence: His heroic deeds were celebrated in every corner of India.
sentences.translation: 他的英勇事迹在印度的每个角落被传颂。

sentences.sentence: As long as mist hangs o'er the mountains, the deeds of the brave will be remembered.
sentences.translation: 只要云雾还环绕着群山，英勇事迹就会被人铭记。
